Wow, I am getting Amy Winehouse  vibes.

Edit: way deeper, I feel for this song. 

Literally, having gone through that Existential crisis earlier in my life, I understand soo fucking well why her lyrics are the way they are. A kind of mental shock. She's put herself into a hard swing of anxiety, depression, and other swirling emotions. Wanting a way to just forget about how temporary we all are in this world for sure.

I'd rather much just be awake as much as possible. Be as stoned, and do as much with as much knowledge to gain the best in life. 

 Sevdaliza life must go on, our pain is temporary; just like every consciousness. But you know what, I'm glad my cells will manage to become energy transcending into a different animal, or a form of material. Somehow I believe this energy could become something SO AWARE OF ITSELF that the past selves of energy can reflect on themselves. We are just a vessel, even if there's no soul, even if there's nothing ever again. Be above all that depression, coping is hard; fighting yourself is even harder. But in the end you gotta resolve somehow. 

For me I have to fight anxiety, depression, GD, a lot of "physical" problems, that I can stop just by ending one thing, my life. But I don't, I am to strong for that. Will I choose to end it one day? Maybe,  maybe at a much darker time in my life. But I dunno, so I want the dick for a long time, lol.
